skills.name: Roaring Thunderclap
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to **50%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Lightning Flash
skills.desc:
Deals Lightning DMG equal to **70%** of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to **30%** of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% **base chance** for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to **40%** of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to **108%** of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Galvanic Chords
skills.desc: After Serval attacks, deals **Additional** Lightning DMG equal to **36%** of Serval's ATK to all Shocked enemies.

skills.name: Good Night, Belobog
skills.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Serval's ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% **base chance** for all enemies to become Shocked for 3 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies will take Lightning DoT equal to 50% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
